ch0318_00_claver/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ] [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I am
happy to see you in high spirits today.
ch0318_00_claver/0101_0701_02_10: Please do be careful not to injure yourself.
ch0318_00_claver/7101_0701_01_10:
Thanks to the evolution of the Pokédex, we can
check and register Pokémon at any time or place
we choose.
ch0318_00_claver/7101_0701_02_10:
Back in my day, a Pokédex consisted of
handwritten notes in a notebook. It really has
become such a convenient world.
ch0318_00_claver/7102_0701_01_10:
I have actually appeared in one of Miss Iono’s
videos.
ch0318_00_claver/7102_0701_02_10: She scouted me as I was walking around town.
ch0318_00_claver/7102_0701_03_10:
Since then, my students have occasionally called
out to me, saying “I found Mister Walksabout!”
ch0318_00_claver/7103_0701_01_10:
Since Trainers from various regions gather here on
Pasio, it’s the perfect place to meet and interact
with new people.
ch0318_00_claver/7103_0701_02_10:
Perhaps the next time I speak to Master Lear, I’ll
ask if he’d allow us to do some extracurricular
activities here.
ch0318_00_claver/7104_0701_01_10:
What kind of words do young people
use nowadays?
ch0318_00_claver/7104_0701_02_10:
I have been doing my own research in an attempt
to understand what the kids are saying these
days...
ch0318_00_claver/7104_0701_03_10:
but by the time I finally learn something, it seems
to have gone out of fashion. What an L...
ch0318_00_claver/7105_0701_01_10:
Is there anything you would like to do, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ]
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0318_00_claver/7105_0701_02_10:
People often feel like they’re being crushed by
things they believe they MUST do...
ch0318_00_claver/7105_0701_03_10:
But please find things you WANT to do...and find
your treasure!
ch0318_00_claver/1701_0701_01_10: Please take this with you, if you’d like.
ch0318_00_claver/1701_0702_01_10: I will be cheering you on.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0701_01_10:
At our academy, we have an independent study
assignment—the Treasure Hunt.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0701_02_10:
We want our students to turn their eyes upon the
wider world and deepen their understanding.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0701_03_10:
The theme is a difficult one...but the lesson is
important, I think.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’re ever in trouble, please come and
talk to me.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0702_02_10:
It could be about Pokémon, or not. We can talk
about anything.
ch0318_00_claver/2501_0702_03_10: Helping children grow makes me happy.
ch0318_00_claver/2511_0701_01_10:
I used to be a researcher before I became a
teacher.
ch0318_00_claver/2511_0701_02_10:
Many professors who research Pokémon are
gathered here on Pasio, so I would like to hear
their stories.
ch0318_00_claver/2511_0702_01_10:
By seeing different worlds, you will open yourself
to new opportunities.
ch0318_00_claver/2511_0702_02_10: What can I do? What do I like?
ch0318_00_claver/2511_0702_03_10:
I don’t think there’s ever an end to finding the
answer to these questions.
ch0318_00_claver/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I’m glad to see you starting
your day so full of energy.
ch0318_00_claver/3003_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re full of vim and vigor. Please
make sure not to injure yourself.
ch0318_00_claver/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done giving your all today. Did anything
exciting happen?
